category.name: Product Structure.Configurator Context
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSM_enable_product_configurator
preference.preference_description: Enables the use of Teamcenter Product Configurator to configure the variability of Product Structure. Any modification to the preference value requires restart of Structure Manager application to avoid data integrity issues. The PSEVariantsMode preference will be ignored and Variants will be authored/configured using Configurator Context via association or setting the Default Configurator Context. Valid values are: * true: Product Structure will use the Configurator Context for Variability. This is the default value. * false: Product Structure will refer to the PSEVariantsMode preference for Variability.
